items.sentence: The President of the U.S. paid a formal visit to China.
Tom will be invited, but I don't think that he'll come.
Please ask Tom to leave and never come back here again.
Tom plans to sell or give away everything that he owns.
Tom was lucky his toast fell with the buttered side up.
It's reasonable to assume Tom was the one who did that.
It won't be long before Tom realizes he made a mistake.
Tom was the first one to realize that Mary was in pain.
The stars are shining very brightly in the sky tonight.
Please send an empty email message to info@example.com.
I didn't expect Tom to be able to speak French so well.
I can't remember when I last saw Tom and Mary together.
That's not the main reason Tom doesn't want to do that.
That's not the only reason why Tom should've done that.
I'm the only person that can probably help Tom do that.
Don't forget to tell Mary she has to do that this week.
I was surprised that Tom didn't go to Boston with Mary.
A T-shirt isn't appropriate attire for a job interview.
The police believe that Tom was involved in the murder.
Tom isn't sure that Mary knows that she has to do that.
